tags: i know it’s not cannon but this random thought just made me cry so yeah i had to share
body:
Bren’s identity

I just had a terrible terrible thought. What if… what if Caleb was Astrid? A young girl taken from the Zemnian lands, so happy to finaly be able to call himself« Bren », to become who he felt inside, that he follows blindly the man who enabled his transition: Trent. Oh he kills, he murders, because how could the Empire who welcomed him could be bad? And when Trent asks him to become « Astrid » for a night to seduce a target, it doesn’t really matter if it makes his skin crawl… It’s just temporary right? Trent wouldn’t really use this as a punishment because he *understand*… and after a while, he even starts becoming proud for the first time of Astrid, as she is an *essential tool* for the empire.

And as Caleb starts hating Trent, he also starts burying deep how conflicted Astrid makes him feel… for she is every blind belief he held.


The following gif is from the extremely talented bunpuns. Go check them out !!!! :)

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: M9 prompt. Caleb, Cad, and Fjord attend a pottery class together
question: M9 prompt. Caleb, Cad, and Fjord attend a pottery class together
answer:
I’ve done pottery extensively over the past few months in my college ceramics class, and let me just say, it’s messy as all fuck.

The clay they use is soft, and pliable. It’s easy for them to pull pieces off for themselves and shape it by hand, but the teacher isn’t letting them do that. No, they have to use the wheel to throw the clay. They have to throw the clay on the wheel to make a proper pot or mug if they want to make anything at all. 

Caduceus has a fun time, with his clay and his wheel, though he’s told he is spinning the wheel too slowly, and the thing is coming out lopsided and lumpy because he doesn’t hold his hands where they need to be, to shape it properly. He doesn’t mind a bit of a weird cup, it’ll be nice either way because he took care in making it. He figures that’s all that matters, really, if he’s doing this for fun. 

Fjord has his wheel turning to fast, foot all the way down on the pedal while his hands force the clay to shape. It’s too fast, and the instructor tries to make him stop but it’s already to late. The clay is too thin, and it falls to the side in a pile of mush, being thrown off the wheel a moment later from the speed and smacking into Caduceus’s head. 

Fjord has to collect his clay, roll it all back into a ball and wet it up all over again, kneading it out for a few minutes to get it back to a consistency that will allow him to use it again, before he can try again.

Caleb is meticulous in his planning. He wants to make a bowl, for him, and a nice ceramic mug for Nott. It would be a good gift, she’s been wanting a new mug for awhile, and he could paint it shiny for her. The bowl for him is really for Frumpkin, so he can drink milk out of, when he is a good cat. Which is always. 

The bowl doesn’t come out right when he is done the first time. It looks like a bowl, but the walls are too thin, and it’s too tall. He destroys it and tries again, breaking it a second time because now it is too small and thick. It is the fifth try when he is satisfied enough with the bowl to try with the mug. 

The mug takes, at least, ten tries. In that time he also, in his frustration, used left over pieces of clay to construct a flower without it’s stem, the size of his palm, that he leaves out to harden and dry. 

Fjord manages to make a usable plate, when all is said and done, with a steady lip that would allow a small bit of liquid to rest inside it. He’s proud of it, and the instructor approved of the design. He doesn’t plan to keep it, because he knows Jester would get more enjoyment out of the thing then he would. 

Caduceus doesn’t make a mug or a bowl, or even a plate. Caduceus creates small snail like creatures out of clay, after not managing to make what he’d been trying for the whole time. He enjoys the little clay creatures, and is pleased at the results. 

He plans to give each of his friends their own little snail friend, once the clay has hardened and gone through the kiln. He’s sure they will appreciate the colorful little creatures, after he’s painted them. 

They let the instructor take away their work to be fired in the kiln, and return a few days later to pick them up. They will gift the gifts to their friends a few days after that. 

The Mighty Nein make a point to go to a pottery class as a group after that, to try it out together.

tags: i haven't discoursed in a while but man i'm annoyed
summary: Since apparently this is the hot new discourse, reminder that "cr fandom largely ignores and devalues the canon wlw" and...
body:
Since apparently this is the hot new discourse, reminder that “cr fandom largely ignores and devalues the canon wlw” and “sometimes mlm don’t get treated great on the show” are two concepts that can exist at the same time and pitting lgbt fans against each other is completely unhelpful to anyone. We all love this show and we all should be collectively wanting them to do the best they can with their representation, and if people are pointing out that they don’t feel properly represented then that probably says something important!!

Also, read the things people are actually saying before you get mad about them, and quit bastardizing legitimate concerns just because you wanna be rude online

Also, read the things people are actually saying before you get mad about them, and quit bastardizing legitimate concerns just because you wanna be rude online

tags: i also had some Watchmaker Percy feels while writing this
angry traumatized men bent on some form of revenge or recompense
coming to a point when all they want is to create something that's not destructive
who want to find a way to share stories that are large than themselves to the world
summary: @yfere​‘s most recent Shipping Calculus post, and the points given to Caleb/Kooky Comparisons got me thinking about Caleb’s...
body:
@yfere​‘s most recent Shipping Calculus post, and the points given to Caleb/Kooky Comparisons got me thinking about Caleb’s relationship to fairy tales and folklore. Which then got me thinking about the possibility of Caleb, the Bard. I really like the idea of Caleb leaving the asylum and deciding that while he still wants to learn and grow, and discover new kinds of magic to achieve his goals (whatever those may be), he wants to do it so forging a new path. 

He leaves the asylum and he thinks of the stories his mother shared with him growing up; of the lullabies and ballads his father sang him. He knows there is magic to be found in those words. He knows there is magic to be made in the creation of new legends.

I like the idea of Caleb the Historian–Caleb the documentor. Caleb, who knows the violence of the loss of culture and language. Caleb, who knows the violence of his own past was made up of stories only half-told.

I like the idea of Caleb–uncertain if they’re the kind of people who help and care for children–meeting kids and gifting them allegories, and adventure, and wonder.

I like the idea of Caleb, half-joking, coining a small jingle for the unlikely family he’s found, and with it imbuing them with the strength to rush into battle with improved odds. I like the idea of the party sitting around a campfire, exhausted after a battle, and Caleb humming under his breath, the soft melody knitting up their wounds as surely as Jester and Caduceus’ prayers.

I like the idea of him having to be choosier with his spells, and still taking Identify, and Haste and Slow. Still making a point to learn Polymorph for his best friend. 

I just really like the idea that there might be a version of Caleb who’s more interested in crafting new stories than resurrecting an old one.

summary: You are my sunshine, my only sunshine, You make me happy when skies are grey, You’ll never know dear, how much I love you Please...
caption:
You are my sunshine, my only sunshine,

You make me happy when skies are grey,

You’ll never know dear, how much I love you

Please don’t take

My sunshine

Away

summary: "There’s a bit of a misconception here. Caleb and I have a very special relationship. It is that of a parent and a child....
body:
“There’s a bit of a misconception here. Caleb and I have a very special relationship. It is that of a parent and a child. But I am the parent. You do understand that, correct? I protect him. He’s my boy. And I keep him safe. I want him to thrive and get better and better and more powerful and stronger. Because he can achieve great things. When I found him, he was nothing. He was a scared little boy in the corner of a jail cell. And as we have gotten more comfortable, he has gotten more comfortable and come out of his shell. It’s my job to protect him because I love him, and I am his protector. Not because he protects me.”

-Nott the Brave

summary: New mighty nein formation idea codename the nuke.  Caduceus casts holy weapon on beau again giving her the extra 2d8 radient...
body: New mighty nein formation idea codename the nuke. Caduceus casts holy weapon on beau again giving her the extra 2d8 radient damage per attack, caleb hastes her giving her +2ac and an extra attack, and jester casts another buff on her like shield of faith. Then beau lights up her gloves and the charges in destroying everything in her path. Nott, fjord, and yasha follow to give support if needed

summary: beau week day 7: found family this is super scribbly and a day late bc I’ve been busy, but I couldn’t not draw the Best Girls™...
caption:
beau week day 7: found family

this is super scribbly and a day late bc I’ve been busy, but I couldn’t not draw the Best Girls™

[id: a digital drawing of beau and jester from critical role. beau is a thin, wiry human woman with brown skin and brown hair, wearing a light blue top and pants. she is sitting on the ground, holding a brown bo staff with a pink ribbon tied to it. beau is leaning her head against jester, a blue-skinned tiefling sitting next to her, and wearing a white shirt with pink flowers, a dark blue skirt, a pink choker, and brown boots. she has brown horns and a tail with a spade tip. jester has her eyes closed and a hand on beau’s knee; beau has her eyes half-closed and is looking at jester. both are smiling slightly. the background is muted pastel blues, greens, and browns. end id]

tags: this is ALL YOUR FAULT anon
i take NO responsibility for the angst contained herein
as this sort of works for the day four prompt
summary: i don't know why this popped into my head but if beau dies and they have to do a resurrection ritual for her i WILL cry at...
question: i don't know why this popped into my head but if beau dies and they have to do a resurrection ritual for her i WILL cry at whatever caleb says
answer:
hey anon? fuck you. i was having a perfectly good day not thinking about Beauregard dying and now I am! why would you do this! 

Now I’m thinking about Caleb turning Frumpkin back into the tiny pigmy owl and resting it very gently on Beau’s chest while he speaks to her in a low shaky voice

Beauregard, you know I am terrible at this. But…you are my friend and we–I need you back, ja? I know you think you are an asshole, and sometimes you are, but we are all better–I am better with you here. So you have to come back, we have a promise to keep to each other. 

And then he whispers, trying very, very hard not to break down and lose it–Please come back, Schwester. He pats owl Frumpkin on the head and tells Beau, He is yours for the month.

also let’s not think about Fjord and Jester’s contributions. let’s not think about Fjord also bringing up the promise they made to each other. let’s not think about Fjord calling her his First Mate. let’s not think about Jester calling Beau her very best friend. let’s not think about Jester begging her not to leave her, not like Molly did. let’s not think about the possibility of Laura motherfucking harp music Bailey pulling out another mid-resurrection love confession and immediately shattering my heart into a million tiny pieces.

tags: i have £8 in my bank acc and i dont get paid til the end of the week so
summary: Hello everyone!! It’s the end of the month and you know what that means!! I’m broke as hell! I’m opening a few slots for...
caption:
Hello everyone!! It’s the end of the month and you know what that means!!

I’m broke as hell!

I’m opening a few slots for commissions in this simple sorta style. I’ll draw your favourite characters, your OCs, your DND PCs, and pretty much anything else you might want. Price is set pretty low (£6, or two kofi donations) cause it’s not the prettiest art style, but tips are always appreciated!!

Payment will be via kofi or paypal, and I prefer it to be sent before I start working! 

Please DM me on tumblr for more information!!
